name: memecoin-bot-scalable
description: Bot de trading memecoin modulaire avec vraies donnÃ©es

scripts.db:stats: ts-node -e "const {db} = require('./src/database/connection'); const {DatabaseSchema} = require('./src/database/schema'); async function run() { const schema = new DatabaseSchema(); const stats = await schema.getTableStats(); console.log(stats); await db.close(); } run().catch(console.error);"
scripts.test:birdeye: ts-node -e "import('./src/collectors/birdeye').then(m => { const c = new m.BirdeyeCollector({enabled: true, rateLimit: 1, retryAttempts: 3, timeout: 10000}); c.fetchTokens(5).then(console.log); })"
scripts.test:dexscreener: ts-node -e "import('./src/collectors/dexscreener').then(m => { const c = new m.DexScreenerCollector({enabled: true, rateLimit: 1, retryAttempts: 3, timeout: 10000}); c.fetchTokens(5).then(console.log); })"

author: Memecoin Bot Team
